languages.text: "Эти простолюдины хотели попасть в реакторную? Я исполню это желание. Бросьте их в парогенераторный отсек, пусть сварятся там".

traits.locale_text: "Изменники хотели в реакторную? Я исполню это желание. Бросьте их в парогенераторный отсек".

languages.text: "These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."
languages.original_text: "Эти простолюдины хотели попасть в реакторную? Я исполню это желание. Бросьте их в парогенераторный отсек, пусть сварятся там".

traits.locale_text: "These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."
"They wanted to get into the reactor room? I will grant you that favour. Throw the renegades into the steam generator bay. As for the officers... process them into corpse bars."
"These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."
"If they wish to go to the reactor room, I will not stand in their way. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay. As for the officers... process them into corpse starch."
"These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."
"These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."
"These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."
"These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."

languages.text: « Puisque ces roturiers voulaient s'introduire dans la salle du réacteur, je vais exaucer leur souhait. Qu'on jette les traîtres dans la baie du générateur de vapeur où ils seront bouillis vifs. »
languages.original_text: "These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque ces roturiers voulaient s'introduire dans la salle du réacteur, je vais exaucer leur souhait. Qu'on jette les traîtres dans la baie du générateur de vapeur où ils seront bouillis vifs. »
« S'ils veulent aller dans la salle du réacteur, libre à eux. Jetez les traîtres dans la baie du générateur de vapeur. Quant aux officiers... faites-en de la fécule de cadavre. »

languages.text: «Si tantas ganas tienen estos plebeyos de entrar en la sala del reactor, les concederé lo que desean. Arrojen a los traidores al compartimento del generador de vapor; que se cuezan vivos ahí dentro».
languages.original_text: "These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."

traits.locale_text: «Si tantas ganas tienen estos plebeyos de entrar en la sala del reactor, les concederé lo que desean. Arrojen a los traidores al compartimento del generador de vapor; que se cuezan vivos ahí dentro».
«Si quieren ir a la sala del reactor, no me interpondré en su camino. Arrojen a los traidores a la bahía del generador de vapor. En cuanto a los oficiales... conviértanlos en almidón de cadáveres».

languages.text: “这些贱民想去反应堆室是吧？那就送他们一程。给我把这些叛徒丢进蒸气发生器里，让他们好好蒸个桑拿。”
languages.original_text: "These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."

traits.locale_text: “这些贱民想去反应堆室是吧？那就送他们一程。给我把这些叛徒丢进蒸气发生器里，让他们好好蒸个桑拿。”
“既然他们想去反应堆室，那就送他们一程吧。给我把这些叛徒丢进蒸气发生器里，至于这些军官……把他们加工成尸体淀粉。”

languages.text: 「あの平民どもがリアクター室へ行きたいだと？その願いを叶えてやろう。 裏切り者どもを蒸気発生室に放り込め。そこで茹で上がればいい」
languages.original_text: "These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."

traits.locale_text: 「あの平民どもがリアクター室へ行きたいだと？その願いを叶えてやろう。 裏切り者どもを蒸気発生室に放り込め。そこで茹で上がればいい」
「彼らがリアクター部屋へ行きたいのなら、邪魔はしない。 裏切り者は蒸気発生室に放り込め。将校は…コープススターチに加工しろ」

languages.text: "Dieses Gesindel wollte in den Reaktorraum? Das können sie haben. Werft die Verräter in das Dampfgeneratormodul ... dort können sie kochen."
languages.original_text: "These commoners wanted to enter the reactor room? I shall fulfil their wish. Throw the traitors into the steam generator bay — they can boil in there."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Gesindel wollte in den Reaktorraum? Das können sie haben. Werft die Verräter in das Dampfgeneratormodul ... dort können sie kochen."
"Wenn sie in den Reaktorraum gehen wollen, werde ich ihnen nicht im Weg stehen. Werft die Verräter ins Dampfgeneratormodul. Und was sie Offiziere angeht ... verarbeitet sie zu Leichenstärke."
